name: message
question: Are you aware you are canceling with your current company and entering a contract with Alder, Inc.?

name: radioChoice
question: Do you understand you will be paying a monthly rate of $49.95?

name: checkboxChoice
question: Check all that apply. I understand:

options.value: I am entering into a new contract.
options.label: I am entering into a new contract.

options.value: I will be responsible for $49.95 each month until my contract is over.
options.label: I will be responsible for $49.95 each month until my contract is over.

options.value: I have three days to cancel.
options.label: I have three days to cancel.

options.value: If I cancel after three days, I will be responsible for the remainder of the contract.
options.label: If I cancel after three days, I will be responsible for the remainder of the contract.

options.value: My system is monitored and if it is set off, the cops will come to my home.
options.label: My system is monitored and if it is set off, the cops will come to my home.

name: Select
question: Which of the following is not true?

options.value: I can cancel any time with no penalty.
options.label: I can cancel any time with no penalty.

options.value: I will be responsible for the remaining balance of the contract if I cancel early.
options.label: I will be responsible for the remaining balance of the contract if I cancel early.

options.value: I have to set the alarm for the house to be protected.
options.label: I have to set the alarm for the house to be protected.

options.value: My alarm system is with Alder, Inc.
options.label: My alarm system is with Alder, Inc.

options.value: I am happy with the system as it has been explained to me.
options.label: I am happy with the system as it has been explained to me.

options.value: I am happy with the level of customer service I have received today.
options.label: I am happy with the level of customer service I have received today.

options.value: I am happy with the representatives who have helped protect my home today.
options.label: I am happy with the representatives who have helped protect my home today.
